text:
MEMORANDUM
July 29, 1983

To: R. 0. Sharp
cc: M. 3. Novak
FROM: = S. E. Gustafson

SUBJECT: BATTLE KIT SUPPORT HISTORY

PURPOSE:

Response to your request for past levels of support
for Battle Kit.

DISCUSSION:
BATTLE KIT BUDGET HISTORY
PROPOSED
1980 1981 1982 1983 1984
1.75MM 1.5MM 1,274MM 1.64 1.35MM
BATTLE KIT ITEM HISTORY
1980 1981 1982 1983 1984

2.299MM = 3. 755MM = 2.992MM—2.625MM = 2.21 3M

*Based on proposed budget and .61 average cost per
item in 1983.

Because there are so many contradictory records on
past Battle Kit items, it {s impossible to determine
the actual figures for 1980 and 1981. The budget
figures represent the amount spent on Battle Kit in a
given year. The item amounts represent what was
available for use in a given year, some of which were
carried over from previous years and SMP programs

Let me know if you need additional information.

 

OGSTP9029

7406416

summary: Based on proposed budget and.61 average cost per item in 1983. Budget figures represent the amount spent on Battle Kit in a given year. Item amounts represent what was available for use in that year, some of which were carried over from previous years and SMP programs. Let me know if you need additional information.
